<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Battlefield Persistence](/Spells.aspx?ID=746)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Battle](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You are about to attempt a saving throw, but haven't rolled yet.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You're difficult to remove from battle. You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering save, and if the triggering save is against an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect, it treats you as if you were 2 levels higher.
